article_title: Ruthenberg: Really ladies, you're much better than this
article_text:
Enid, OK (73701)

Today

Cloudy early with scattered thunderstorms developing this afternoon. A few storms may be severe. High 83F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%..

Tonight

Partly cloudy. A stray severe thunderstorm is possible. Low 58F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph.

og.description: Women beating the tar out of each other just flies in the face of the carefully crafted order of things. Admittedly, crafted by men.
